Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1988
Subject: Bruce Ruffin healing process
Bruce Ruffin is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/22/1988
Subject: Kevin Maas learns new position
Kevin Maas has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Third Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director
